result.markdown:
---
title: "Socio economic data"
author: Raphael Saldanha
date: last-modified
---


## Packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(arrow)
```
:::


## HDI


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hdi <- read_delim(
  file = "../socioeconomic-data/idhm.csv",
  delim = ",", locale=locale(decimal_mark = "."), 
  na = "-",
  col_types = cols(
    CD_GEOCMU = col_character(),
    MunicÃ­pio = col_character(),
    CodEstado = col_character(),
    Estado = col_character(),
    IDHM1991 = col_double(),
    IDHMR1991 = col_double(),
    IDHML1991 = col_double(),
    IDHME1991 = col_double(),
    R1991 = col_double(),
    IDHM2000 = col_double(),
    IDHMR2000 = col_double(),
    IDHML2000 = col_double(),
    IDHME2000 = col_double(),
    R2000 = col_double(),
    IDHM2010 = col_double(),
    IDHMR2010 = col_double(),
    IDHML2010 = col_double(),
    IDHME2010 = col_double(),
    R2010 = col_double(),
    NM_MUNNICIP = col_character()
  )
) %>%
  clean_names() %>%
  rename(code_muni = cd_geocmu, name_muni = municipio, code_uf = cod_estado, uf = estado) %>%
  select(-nm_munnicip) %>%
  mutate(code_muni = substr(code_muni, 0, 6))
```
:::


## Export


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
write_parquet(x = hdi, sink = "hdi.parquet")
```
:::
